I feel like: The most god awful movie ever created. there are bad movies such as \"justice LEAGUE\"\, \"the room\"\, \"suicide squad\" and OTHERS\, they are bad but at least you can laugh because of how cringy they are\, but with the last jedi the only thing you get is disappointment and feeling of great franchise being murdered. 0/10 worst movie ever!
